item.title: Grafana
item.description: Grafana allows you to query, visualize, alert on and understand your metrics no matter where they are stored. Create, explore, and share beautiful dashboards with your team and foster a data driven culture. The easiest way to get started is with Grafana Cloud, our fully composable observability stack.
